title.rendered: The Perfect Tool for Children’s Alphabet Learning

content.rendered:
Animal ABC Book

Introducing Amazing Animal Funphabets – the perfect tool for parents and teachers to make learning the alphabet fun and engaging for children aged 4-8.

MASSACHUSSETS, UNITED STATES, April 13, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Just Believe Inc, with author Athena Goodman, is excited to introduce Amazing Animal Funphabets, the latest addition to our line of educational tools for children aged 4-8. This #animalabc book is designed to make learning the alphabet engaging and fun for children, while also providing a valuable teaching resource for parents and teachers.

The book features 26 vibrant #abcanimals stories, including Alligator and Wolf, that capture children’s imaginations and encourage them to learn their letters. The story follows Jayanzi on an alphabetical adventure with animals that share his initial letter in a delightful classroom setting. As the teacher challenges her bright and eager students to think of animals that begin with each letter of the alphabet, Jayanzi delivers an impassioned speech, animated by its rhythm and rhyme.

Available in e-book, audiobook, paperback, and hardcopy formats, Amazing Animal Funphabets is accessible to everyone.

It’s the perfect tool to make learning the alphabet a fun and memorable experience, whether at home or in the classroom. This #alphabetbook is also a great #abcbook and #myfirstabcbook for young learners and features a unique #handprintalphabetbook design.

Just Believe Inc, with author Athena Goodman, is committed to providing quality educational resources that inspire and engage children. We believe that learning should be fun and exciting, and our products reflect that commitment. We are confident that Amazing Animal Funphabets will be a valuable addition to any child’s educational journey.

For more information on Amazing Animal Funphabets or to place an order, please visit:

https://www.booklaunch.io/justbelieveinc/funphabets

https://amzn.to/3mrfvFr

Princessa Clendinen
Just Believe Group
+1 781-540-1161
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Instagram
YouTube

You just read:

News Provided By

April 14, 2023, 01:18 GMT
